author: Angel Arruñada
description: "For my Legacy cocktail, I was inspired by two classic cocktails: the Mai Tai and the Dark and Stormy. My drink honours the first generation of the family Bacardí: Don Facundo Bacardí Massó and sons (Emilio, Facundo and Jose). The roots of the untamable spirit."We say: Rum laced ginger, almond and lime.
name: El Murciélago

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger beer and crushed ice
